---
title: Data Use and Responsibility
---

CCN is committed to treating data responsibly and providing credit to the authors who worked hard to collect, perform QAQC, etc. Download the Coastal Carbon Network's data responsibility agreement:


```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(downloadthis)

## One file example
download_file(
  path = "downloads/CCN_Data_Responsibility_20190308.pdf",
  output_name = "CCN_Data_Responsibility_Agreement",
  button_label = "Download Me",
  button_type = "info",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = FALSE
)

# other examples
# https://fmmattioni.github.io/downloadthis/articles/downloadthis.html
```


### How do I cite data downloaded from the Atlas?

Data downloaded from the Atlas will include a bibliography tailored to the dataset you have downloaded. Please cite the original data publications as well as the Coastal Carbon Network.

### How to cite the Coastal Carbon Network

Database citation in progress. Licensing is listed under the [Creative Commons BY 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
